body.name: OmniStar L80 4K Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth, 1500 ANSI Lumen Native 1080P Video Projector, Auto Focus/Keystone, 2x15W Speakers, 200" Display Compatible with iOS/Android/HDMI/USB/TV Stick
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 17 hrs 39 mins
features: 【Firmware Update】The latest update significantly improves your viewing experience by reducing fan noise. The new Intelligent Screen Alignment Feature automatically detects your projection screen, optimizing display through keystone correction. With the enhanced Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance Feature, the projector recognizes obstacles and adjusts keystone correction accordingly. Language improvements include fixing issues with menus displayed in Chinese, ensuring a user-friendly interface.

【The Brightest LCD Projector】The next generation optics innovated by CASIRIS has pushed the boundary of single LCD projectors that raised the bar for brightness of single LCD projector. Delivering an astonishing brightness of 1500 ANSI lumen which is 300% brighter than other LCD projectors. Native 1080P Full HD offers stunning clarity and crisp details that brings your entertainment to life.

【Room Filling Sound & Dual-Way Bluetooth Connection】L80 is equipped with powerful 2 x 15W speakers, a 4XNBR subwoofer, and professional audio DSP AKM7735, delivering a truly immersive auditory experience for exceptional sound entertainment, from the subtlest whispers to the thunderous explosions. Not just a projector, but also a powerful High-Fidelity speaker that will blow your mind with its amazing sound quality. Get ready to take your parties to the next level with this all-in-one device!

【Smart Adjustment】With its powerful intelligent algorithm, the L80 projector offers instant auto focus and auto keystone correction functionality, enjoy hassle-free setup and get a perfectly vivid and clear rectangular images without any interruption or the need to lift a finger. With Digital Zoom, you can easily enlarge portions of the projected content or adjust the zoom level to suit your viewing preferences while it won't affect image quality.

【Smart 4K Projector】Experience seamless access to a multitude of apps through Android TV 9.0, offering a diverse array of video content. Please be aware that due to HDCP copyright restrictions, direct streaming of services like Netflix, Disney, Hulu, Prime Video, etc., is not supported. For an elevated viewing experience, we recommend using a TV stick. Nevertheless, the projector is equipped with built-in HDMI, AV, USB, and 3.5mm headphone ports, ensuring compatibility with various devices.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brightest LCD Projector with Booming Sound

Auto Focus You can enjoy vivid and clear images without any interruption or the need to lift a finger. Auto Keystone Correction Enjoy hassle-free setup and get a perfectly rectangular projection automatically. Digital Zoom Easily enlarge portions of the projected content or adjust the zoom level to suit your viewing preferences while it won't affect image quality.

Why OmniStar L80 ? ✔ 1500 ANSI Lumens - Experience stunning visuals with OmniStar L80 - 1500 ANSI Lumens of brightness illuminates every scene, even during the daytime in well-lit rooms. ✔ Multiple-Ai Adaptive System - With its powerful intelligent algorithm, the L80 projector offers instant auto focus and auto keystone correction functionality, enjoy hassle-free setup. ✔ Intelligent Screen Alignment Feature - The projector can now automatically detect the projection screen and adjust its keystone correction, ensuring the display is perfectly aligned and fits entirely within the screen boundaries. ✔ Intelligent Obstacle Avoidance Feature - It can now recognize obstacles in front of the wall and adjust the keystone correction to project around them, ensuring an uninterrupted viewing experience. ✔ Digital Zoom - Effortlessly magnify sections of the projected content or modify the zoom level to match your viewing preferences. ✔ Native 1080P Projector -Native 1080P Full HD offers stunning clarity and crisp details that brings your entertainment to life. ✔ Bluetooth 5.0 Chip - Bluetooth Connectivity & BT Speaker Mode. Not just a projector, but also a powerful High-Fidelity speaker that will blow your mind with its amazing sound quality. ✔ HIFI Sound - 2 x 15W speakers | 4XNBR subwoofer | DSP AKM7735. ✔ Epic Screen - Enjoy a larger-than-life cinema from 80” to 200” with a range of distances to the wall from 9.4 to 23.4ft.
Previous page Next page 1 Illuminates Every Scene 2 220% Clearer lmage 3 30W Booming Sound 4 Bluetooth Speaker Mode 5 Epic 200" Screen

Why OmniStar L80 ? ✔Smart Android TV - Experience seamless access to a multitude of apps except services like Netflix, Disney, Hulu, Prime Video, etc which is not supported due to HDCP copyright restrictions. ✔Custom 5.7" LCD Module - Providing 16.77 million colors and 50000:1 contrast for home theater level. ✔ Dual WiFi Connection - Enjoy extended range with 2.4G WiFi or a stable network speed with 5G WiFi. Whether gaming indoors or watching movies outdoors, elevate your experience! ✔Cast Your Content - Cast your content, apps, and games directly to L80 from your favorite device with seamless content streaming. Let the L80 projector become the ultimate entertainment companion ✔ IP5X Dust Proof - Keep it protected for optimal performance, allowing you to focus on enjoying stunning visuals without any interruptions. ✔ 30000 Hours Long Lifespan - Offers an extended life of 30,000 hours lasting up to 20 years with 4 hours of daily use and low power consumption at only 33% of a TV. ✔ Equipped with Multiple Ports - Whether it's HDMI, USB, or audio inputs, the L80 has you covered.

What about the noise？ The firmware for L80 is now upgradable, and according to customer feedback, there's a noticeable decrease in noise after the upgrade. What is the input lag? The input lag for gaming is approximately 15ms. What's the contrast? The static contrast is 1000:1. The dynamic contrast is 50,000:1.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great image quality
reviews.reviewText: I tested 6 different projectors for my living room which is very bright during the day. They were all up to $500max.They all range from 800 Ansi Lumens up to 1500 Ansi Lumens.Among the 6, this was by far the best quality and brighter image and better than 2 other wich were more expensive and less capacity at a $500 on price.Im happy with the quality at this extremely great price for what you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Going in a light flooded grand room (80’X100’X40’)
reviews.reviewText: Light at first playoff game was bright bright but images still viewable with a 100” diagonal picture zoom.Second playoff game allowed sunset and lower light input from high unshaded windows and lower partially shaded to allow the 150” screen to fill and the image quality was sensational.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great picture & sound. Pair with a Roku.
reviews.reviewText: First things first, for the price, I don't think you can get a better or brighter picture, which is what I was looking for because I have this mounted under my covered patio. Not bright enough to get a great picture mid-day or in direct sunlight. But once the sun starts to go down around, it's really great. And at night? FANTASTIC! Super satisfied. But if you need something during the day, you're going to need spend a lot more on a laser projector.The speaker was surprisingly good. When I bought this, I figured I'd need to get a cheap soundbar, but it really wasn't necessary. If you're buying this as your main TV, maybe you get a better audio system, especially if you're going for "immersive." But for my purposes, the sound was actually better than expected.I recommend getting a small streaming device to connect to it. At the time of this review, it’s running some bad Android operating system. It does have a few good options, including the popular ones like Disney+, Max, Netflix, and Hulu. It's missing Peacock, Tablo (an app I use to stream and record live TV), and the Paramount+ and Prime Video apps don't work (pretty much every app used to stream football). This could all be fixed with a software update (which it can do wirelessly). If I see one come in that fixes these issues, I’ll update the review.In the end though, it’s a solid product. It feels like it’s made with quality materials. The picture is fantastic in low light, and the sound is excellent for a built-in speaker. Pairing it up with a Roku or Chromecast will solve your streaming problems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good projector at a great price
reviews.reviewText: I liked b the crisp bright picture overall. The ease of use is also very good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The 1500 ansi lumes is great and the video quality too, but after 2 weeks it started to have a yellow spot showing in the white color.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great projector at a nice price point
reviews.reviewText: Very satisfied. Using primarily for outdoor setup. Very bright. Fan noise not too loud. Using with a chrome stick. Great product for this price point. Only issues - no upwards projection and really think it needs to be straight on as projecting from the side the edges are out of focus a bit. Arrived quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This projector is a great find. Its automatic display adjustments, outstanding picture quality, and user-friendly interface really set it apart. With its broad language support and automatic focus correction, it's quite versatile. The sleek design is an added bonus. Overall, it's an excellent projector for the price, and it's incredibly easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great focus, our unit was just defective.
reviews.reviewText: We just replaced a cheaper projector with this one which is 2.5x the price. The image quality, even focus, auto-focus feature, and colour balance on this one are much better.Unfortunately, this orange burn-in(?) developed after a couple weeks and keeps getting worse. It is not as noticeable when there are bright colors on the screen, but against black it is more apparent. We never left a static image or menu open for long, and have tried leaving it off for a few days to see if it helped. Hopefully ours is just defective...Update: Informed that my unit was in fact defective, and judging from reading the other reviews and lack of similar complaints, I would say this is a very rare occurrence and just an unfortunate defect in an otherwise quality product. The customer service was prompt and helpful in getting this sorted for us.

Alors je viens de faire l'achat de se projecteur, personnellement je trouve que l'image est très bonne et très lumineuse,un peu de flou sur les bord mais cela reste leger (et surtout restons indulgent 279€!!!)Le son est très bon aussi,mais j'utilise un système 5.1,alors au niveau du ventilateur avant la mise à jour j'étais à 56 décibels se qui est énorme, mais après la mise à jour je suis passé à 32, se qui est parfait pour moi,et je tiens à féliciter le service après vente ,j'avais un problème pour installer la mise à jour ,ils ont était très très réactif, pour cela reflète le sérieux de cette entreprise.

sono rimasto molto soddisfatto delle sue prestazioni. Il proiettore è dotato di una risoluzione nativa di 1080P, che garantisce immagini nitide e dettagliate, anche in ambienti luminosi. La luminosità di 1500 ANSI Lumens consente di visualizzare immagini chiare e luminose anche in condizioni di luce ambientale.Il proiettore è inoltre dotato di una serie di funzioni avanzate, come l'autofocus, la correzione trapezoidale e il supporto per il 4K. L'autofocus consente di ottenere una messa a fuoco perfetta in modo automatico, mentre la correzione trapezoidale consente di correggere le distorsioni dell'immagine. Il supporto per il 4K consente di visualizzare contenuti in alta definizione.Il proiettore è inoltre dotato di altoparlanti integrati da 2x15W, che offrono un suono potente e chiaro.Nel complesso, sono molto soddisfatto del proiettore Full HD 1080P Nativo. È un proiettore versatile e potente che offre un ottimo rapporto qualità-prezzo.Pro:Risoluzione nativa di 1080PLuminosità di 1500 ANSI LumensAutofocus, correzione trapezoidale e supporto per il 4KAltoparlanti integrati da 2x15W

De momento muy contento con la compra,calidad de imagen muy buena y sonido potente,no pongo imágenes porque no le acen justicia los videos y fotos que se ven,algún problemilla con una aplicación,pero el vendedor está respondiendo muy bien incluso me ofrecieron no sólo solucionarlo sino que también una compensación económica de muy agradecer... recomiendo
